sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello,

Your policy number needs to be confirmed with a One-Time Password (OTP) for successful validation. We have generated an OTP for your Policy Number: Trigger➛...➛Policy_Number . Please use this OTP: Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛OTP to confirm your policy number. This OTP will be valid for 3 minutes.

 

Best regards,

VFS Global.

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello,

Your policy number needs to be confirmed with a One-Time Password (OTP) for successful validation. We have generated an OTP for your Policy Number: Trigger➛...➛Policy_Number . Please use this OTP: Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛OTP to confirm your policy number. This OTP will be valid for 3 minutes.

 

Best regards,

VFS Global.

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
